name: Chess Area
description:
Made for the https://itch.io/jam/chess-jam not much to do in here except pick up some gems and kill the enemy chess pieces. WASD or ZQSD to move, left mouse button for attack with sword. Right mouse button shoots 'magic projectiles' when the meter is filled enough.

Chess pieces and some other assets made by me. Contains some assets from the asset store as this is something I've been playing around with the last month or so :)
